text:
On the same day that the number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the Philippines breached the 40,000-mark, President Rodrigo Duterte signed the controversial anti-terror bill into law.

What do you think of this move?

READ: https://t.co/SOoDu1MjK3 https://t.co/sHjlVANebF
